Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to induction loop listening systems
Summary: Requires public buildings which are or contain an area of public assembly or service to have equipped and installed an induction loop listening system for use by persons who are deaf or hard of hearing.
LawCode: Amd ยง53, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to induction loop listening systems
